main.name: Marvellous Filani
main.bio: Hi I'm Fmarvelsk a student of the Obafemi Awolowo University, from the department of computer science and engineering.Born in the year 1998 on the 26th of october.Am an indigeon of ikole-ekiti, My hobbies includes programming, playing basketball and reading books.I chose to study engineering because i am intrested in the fast growing technological advancement and how i can learn and help in it continual advancement.

testimonials.text: I have worked with him and he is a guy who is commited to working and solving real time problem

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
